actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the services of a mental health counselor shall be covered under part B of medicare and shall be a required service under medicaid.

summary.text: Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of mental health counselor services under the Medicaid program and part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that the services of a mental health counselor shall be covered under part B of medicare and shall be a required service under medicaid.
